justification: The clump occurs in two files 'src/argouml-app/src/org/argouml/ui/JasonsBigTheme.java' and 'src/argouml-app/src/org/argouml/ui/JasonsHugeTheme.java'. Both classes have a large set of common ColorUIResource fields with the same initialization values, indicating that there is unnecessary duplication across multiple files.
